title: Inflation rate in Argentina 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Inflation rate compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 18.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 54.44 was reported at Year 2019
The lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 4.42 was reported at Year 2004
min_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Inflation rate compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 18.
In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has rose over the Year.

max_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Inflation rate compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 18.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 54.44 was reported at Year 2019
The lowest Inflation rate compared to previous year, of value 4.42 was reported at Year 2004
The line significantly increased by 5.22 from Year 2004 to 2005, and lastly, increased by 15.06 from Year 2013 to 2017.
